# The `RecyclingAllocator` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recyclingallocator">RecyclingAllocator</a> - This class wraps an Allocator, adding the functionality of recycling deleted objects. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;class AllocatorType, class T, size&#95;t Size = sizeof(T), size&#95;t Align = alignof(T)&gt;

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recyclingallocator">RecyclingAllocator</a> - This class wraps an Allocator, adding the functionality of recycling deleted objects.

## Public Member Functions

### Allocate() {#a053842782e790424315ed4d6b09f1105}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class SubClass&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>SubClass &#42; llvm::RecyclingAllocator&lt; AllocatorType, T, Size, Align &gt;::Allocate ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Allocate - Return a pointer to storage for an object of type SubClass.

The storage may be either newly allocated or recycled.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/recyclingallocator-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/recyclingallocator-h">RecyclingAllocator.h</a>.

### Deallocate() {#a15b55012c1a5fc0e82d13227332796b9}

<MemberDefinition

  prototype={<>void llvm::RecyclingAllocator&lt; AllocatorType, T, Size, Align &gt;::Deallocate (SubClass &#42; E)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Deallocate - Release storage for the pointed-to object.

The storage will be kept track of and may be recycled.
